title: Autocenter Goedert - Intranet
description: The Goedert Intranet, used for internal communications, photo-sharing, and document-sharing, was outdated and rarely used by employees. The goal was to completely overhaul the intranet with a modern design, eliminate frontend bugs, and create a clean, user-friendly admin panel for the HR and Marketing departments to work efficiently.

title: Velocenter Goedert
description: The Velocenter Goedert was outdated. We created a completely new modern version with a clean design and also custom integrations with the company's ERP system. The goal was to increase sales and improve the user experience.

title: Autocenter Goedert - Credentials API
description: A Go-based API that encrypts and decrypts user credentials.
